Class AgentSim

  • java.lang.Object
    • multiagent.AgentSim
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AgentSim
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a full simulator.
    Version:
    1.1, 1.0 - May 22, 2013
    Author:
    Albani Dario, Federico Patota, Gabriele Buondonno
    See Also:

      • AgentSim

        public AgentSim(int height,
                int width,
                int weed,
                int ags)
        Constructs a simulator creating a new world with the specified characteristics.
        Parameters:
        height - the height of the world
        width - the width of the world
        weed - the number of inaccessible cells
        ags - the number of agents

    • Method Detail

      • addWeedCells

        public void addWeedCells(int weed)
        Adds weeds in cells.
        Parameters:
        weed - the number of weed cells that we want to add

      • initAgentsRandom

        public void initAgentsRandom(int numAgents)
        Positions agents in the world in random positions.

      • initTasks

        public int initTasks()
        Task initialization. TODO update the task list according to your problem. Check the setUpForCoverage and setUpForWeed methods in class World

      • doOneStep

        public boolean doOneStep()
        Executes one step for one agent and switches agent. The one step execution change with respect to the exercise.
        Returns:
        true if there have been two full rounds without any action taken, indicating that the system will have no further evolution.

      • countVisitedCells

        public int countVisitedCells()
        Returns the number of cells with the given status. Visited.
        Returns:
        the number of cells with the given status.

      • countWeedCells

        public int countWeedCells()
        Returns the number of cells with the given status. Weed.
        Returns:
        the number of cells with the given status.

      • countUnsprayedCells

        public int countUnsprayedCells()
        Returns the number of cells with the given status. Sprayed.
        Returns:
        the number of cells with the given status.

      • getTotalCells

        public int getTotalCells()
        Returns the total number of cells.
        Returns:
        the total number of cells.

      • getCalls

        public int getCalls(Action act)
        Returns the number of times the given Action has been called. If the simulation is over and act==Action.noOp, noOp is subtracted the last series of noOps.
        Parameters:
        act - the action to examine.
        Returns:
        the number of times the given Action has been called.

      • getTotalSteps

        public int getTotalSteps()
        Returns the total number of steps performed. The number of total steps is equal to getCalls(Action.noOp) + getCalls(Action.nextMoveToTarget) + getCalls(Action.totalNextStepInTask).
        Returns:
        the number of total steps performed.

      • getTotalRounds

        public int getTotalRounds()
        Returns the total number of complete rounds the simulation has performed. By performing a round, we mean doing one step for each agent. The result is rounded by defect.
        Returns:
        the number of total loops performed.

      • getVisited

        public int getVisited(int agId)
        Returns the number of cells visited by the given agent.
        Parameters:
        agId - the id of the agent

      • statsToString

        public java.lang.String statsToString()
        Convenience method returning a String representation for all the statisics.
        Returns:
        a String representation for the statisics.
